EN.description: The Malle Single Moto Pannier is designed to fit all motorcycles with its intuitive quick attachement system. Handcrafted with resistant materials, an interior waterproof membrane and an expandable roll-top closure, this bag can also be used as a daily bag using its shoulder strap.
details: Size (cm): 29cm/ 43cm/ 20cm
Size (inches): 11,5"/ 17"/ 8"
Volume: 21 Litres
EN.greatDescription:
Use it with the double straps (all included) or via the Malle Module, which enables the dual panniers to mount together, with connection points for the 'Moto Duffel' and the 'Hybrid Moto Tail Pack/Pannier'.

The interior waterproof membrane helps maintain complete waterproofing and paired with the Malle Hurricane Dry Bag, your valuables will be fully protected from dust and moisture.

The Malle motorcycle pannier has an expandable roll-top closure, 6 pockets on the interior and dual exterior pockets (with storm flaps) for locks / tool-roll / gloves or googles. The pannier comes with a shoulder strap, so it can be used as your daily go-everywhere bag.

blocks.text: The Malle Single Moto Pannier is designed to fit all motorcycles with its intuitive quick attachement system. Handcrafted with resistant materials, an interior waterproof membrane and an expandable roll-top closure, this bag can also be used as a daily bag using its shoulder strap.
It uses Nato Spec. military G-Hooks and webbing so the bag can be attached/ removed in less than 3 seconds.
This system with multiple attachement points can be mounted to all motorcycles.
You can mount it with the Malle Module, which enables 2 panniers to mount together, with connection points for the 'Moto Duffel' and the 'Hybrid Moto Tail Pack/Pannier’ on top.
Malle panniers should be fitted with Pannier Rails.

EN.nameProduct: Hedon X Bike Shed Club Racer - Carbon Edition
EN.description:
Introducing the BSMC x HEDON Club Racer – Carbon Edition.
The fourth collaboration between Bike Shed and Hedon and the very first production carbon fibre Heroine. The shell celebrates the weave of the carbon fibre construction with simple sweeps of metallic gold paint the only adornment.
details: Full Carbon Fibre shell
Exposed Carbon Fibre and gold painted shell, gloss finish
ECE homologated clear visor
Hed Armor lining with 360″ cushion padding
Merlin anti-bacterial fabric
Natural calf leather trim and lining
Brass HEDON plate
Brass hardware
Brass DD buckle
3 channels ventilation system
Has 5 different, compatible sexy coloured visors ( to be bought as a separate accessory )
Ultra light and low profile shell
Weight: S/M:1080 grams    L/XL:1190 grams
EN.greatDescription:
On the inside Hedon’s luxury interior is finished with black perforated leather – another first for this lid - with a simple BSMC foil stamp in the crown. As with all Hedon Heroines the Club Racer Carbon Edition benefits from an Anti-Fog double lens and 3 channel ventilation system. The BSMC x HEDON Club Racer is a limited edition production.

Back in 2015 Hedon were the very first brand with which we had the honour of collaborating - on a beautiful pair of Hedonist open-face helmet designs. This was followed two years later with the monochrome HEDON x BSMC CLUB RACER and now the range topping Carbon Fibre edition.  

*An ECE homologated CLEAR VISOR comes with every Heroine Racer purchased*

EN.greatDescription:
When Niels Peter-Jensen was in India in 2018 he couldn’t believe the amount of people who were riding without helmets, women and children riding pillion really caught his attention or more specifically their lack of safety gear. After being a witness to accident involving a young child, Niels a father himself, was compelled to take action to bring about change that might stop this from happening again.
Helmets for India brought the power of Art and the global motorcycle community to the table to raise awareness and to bring helmets to the those who desperately need them in India. Collecting over 1000 helmets from manufacturers to give away. As well as this in an effort to raise awareness manufactures donated helmets and 20 amazing artists worked their magic on the helmets to create a spectacular Art display that has been shown at motorcycle events around the globe. At the end of the year these helmets will be auctioned off and the proceeds will go towards initiatives in India to support non-profit road safety organisations in India.

As well as supplying helmets for the giveaway initiative and the amazing art show Hedon are producing a special edition Helmet to help raise funds for Helmets for India. A percentage of profit from each helmet sold will be donated.

Marking BMW's entrance into the multi-cylinder market in 1985, the longitudinal mounted three and four-cylinder K75, and K100 series had a decade-long run. Called the 'Flying Brick' due to their unconventional engine layout, these bikes are now established donors for café racer conversions.

An increased number of customers asked us if we could build a customized K. And we wanted to go much further than a skin-deep face-lift. We decided that serious modification of the suspension would give the aging K a dramatic, edgy look. It would also give it a 21st-century handling-boost. At this point, we had the
good fortune to discover Retrorides. The custom bike builder from Brazil was working on such a conversion.

Retrorides had spent many months wrestling with CAD software and CNC machines getting the measurements and specifications of the conversion right. The result is a sculpted single-sided, billet aluminum suspension system that holds a parallel shock absorber.
The aircraft-grade aluminum parts arrived at Meister Engineering, and work began on the extensive subframe modifications and assembly.
Believe it or not, this was the easy part. From there, we then went through the painstaking process of getting the finished product to pass Swiss Type Approval.

EN.description: This 2,5 inches Monza Kit Fuel Cap with adapter is made of polished aluminum. This set is suitable for BMW K models (K75, K100, K1100).

blocks.text: BMW K75 K100 K1100 2,5" MONZA KIT polished, fuel cap with adapter
High-quality flip-cap tank lid made of polished aluminum.
Incl. polished adapter and screw set for mounting.
The adapter is screwed tight like the original fuel cap.
After that, simply place the MONZA tank cap in the desired position (12 o'clock position) and secure with a screw lock.
BMW K models (to make sure you adjust the dimensions please)
This 2,5 inches Monza Kit Fuel Cap with adapter is made of polished aluminum. This set is suitable for BMW K models (K75, K100, K1100).

EN.description: This retractable Pop-Up Fuel Cap is a high quality, small batch, CNC milled aluminum fuel cap. This fuel cap is suitable for BMW R models.  The fuel cap is retractable and closes flush with the fuel tank for a clean, aerodynamic look.

blocks.text: The tank cap is screwed tightly into the tank like the original.
Please make sure that the enclosed sealing ring between tank cap socket and tank to avoid leaks!
To open the fuel cap, lightly press the cap and turn it to the left.
A spring will lift the fuel cap up and it can be unscrewed normally. After filling the tank, screw the fuel cap back on (clockwise) and lower it.

EN.description: With its 734 LEDs, the Motogadget Motoscope Pro provides optimal readability! The four pre-installed indicator lights can be used for far more input signals via the Breakout Boxes.

blocks.text: 734 LEDs governed by a 16-bit RISC processor
The rev-counter is displayed fully scalable via the analogue LED band with drag indicator function
Main and secondary display are user configurable
The motoscope pro is equipped with a fully-fledged CAN-bus interface
The dashboard communicates over a proprietary digital one-wire bus (m-Bus) with additional Breakout Boxes to easily expand the application spectrum.
This makes the dashboard highly versatile and makes application to a wide range of vehicles and tasks possible.
The billet aluminium casing is cnc-machined and is easily mounted by two backside threaded holes.
The instrument is equipped with an ABE and does not have to be registered.
Please order the Breakout Box to connect indicator light signals (see Breakout Box Std.) or to connect digital bus-systems (Triumph, H-D) additionally.
For BMW R9T a Breakout Box is not necessary.

EN.description: This 1070CC Big Bore Kit Conrods 151mm is the ultimate solution for sporty touring riders! It fits all BMW R100 models from 1980 on! The motor characteristics are enhanced and the performance boosted with this plug & play kit.

blocks.text: Big Bore Kit 1070cc (14 days right of withdrawal)

“Piston capacity can only be replaced by even more piston capacity” – this was the adopted motto during the company-internal development of the Siebenrock Big Bore Kit. The goal of this construction was to enhance the motor characteristics which were already outstanding thanks to the Power and Replacement Kits. We didn’t just say this, we went out and did it and the result for all BMW 1000 cc models from 1981 onwards was the 1070 cc Big Bore Kit, which turned out to be the ultimate solution for sporty touring riders. After modification, an amazing 80 hp is available at an engine torque of 92Nm. That’s what we call a convincing result.

This performance boost was achieved using 151 millimetre long, high-stability connecting rods which, when weight-optimized and fitted with ARP screws, only put 450 grams on the scales. Quite apart from this, 98 millimetre, weight-optimized pistons are used which only weigh 428 grams including the rings, bolts and clips. Thanks to the well-designed piston form, it is not necessary to adapt the cylinder head to the big bore.
All of the parts required to mount the kit are included within the scope of delivery.
With MOT/TÜV approval and installation instruction. Conrod bearing shell must be ordered seperately !
The use of dual ignition is strongly recommended.
An additional performance boost can be achieved by fitting the SGS2 exhaust system.
Ready-to-install camshaft including camshaft gear and front camshaft bearing on request.
Fits BMW R 100, R 100CS, R 100RS, R 100RT, R 100RS Monolever (x), R 100RT Monolever (x), R 100GS (x), R 100R (x).
(x) = only permitted for vehicles up to 31.3.1994.

This 1070CC Big Bore Kit Conrods 151mm is the ultimate solution for sporty touring riders! It fits all BMW R100 models from 1980 on! The motor characteristics are enhanced and the performance boosted with this plug & play kit.

EN.description: The ultimate 1000 cc conversion kit for all BMW R 80 models from 9/1980 onwards with TÜV approval and installation instructions. Increase in torque and power over the entire revs range, coupled with extreme spontaneity and solid quiet-running are unbeatable arguments for these easily understandable tuning measures.

blocks.text: Contained in the kit are nicasil-coated cylinders and weight-optimised forged pistons that each weigh 150 grams less than the original part.

In addition, the piston shape has been so chosen that no modification to the cylinder head is necessary. The result of the conversion is now an increase in torque from the original 57 Nm to 72 Nm. It is no different with the horsepower. With the R 80G/S, R 80ST and R 80GS the output increases from 49.3 to 59.2 hp and even 63.1 hp can be reached with the R80 road machines. Apart from that, the conversion kit eliminates the typical BMW torque dropout between 4000 and 5000 revs and captivates with a formidably quiet run-ning thanks to the lighter pistons.
In addition the kits also contains stainless steel push rod protection tubes that are already pressed into the cylinders.
Order at the same time a gasket set (art. no. 1100101) , in OEM quality, to complete the fitting of the Power Kit Extra.
For BMW classic airhead models R 80, R 80RT, R 80 Monolever (x), R 80RT Monolever (x), R 80ST, R 80G/S, R 80GS (x), R 80R (x).
(x) = Only permitted for vehicles up to 31.3.1994
To reduce the thermal loading on the machine, we recommend the fiting of an additional oil pan distance ring and / or an oil cooler for all Power Kit Extra conversions.

EN.nameProduct: Right Side Exhaust Pipe BMW K models
EN.description: The Right side exhaust pipe for BMW K-series is 100% Swiss road legal with DTC Swiss Certificate!

blocks.text: When we made our BMW K100 with retroride kit we faced a big problem: the exhaust pipe!
And yes! You know as well as we do how strict the police controls and noises restrictions are in Switzerland and in all Europe.
That's why we have made a homologated version of the right side exhaust for the BMW K100. In order to get this muffler homologated we added a "pre-silencer" in the middle of the exhaust line.
Als wir unsere BMW K100 mit Retroride-Kit gebaut haben, standen wir vor einem großen Problem: dem Auspuffrohr!
Und ja! Sie wissen so gut wie wir, wie streng die polizeilichen Kontrollen und Einschränkungen in der Schweiz und in ganz Europa sind.

Deshalb haben wir eine homologierte Version des rechten Seitenauspuffs für die BMW K100 angefertigt. Um diesen Schalldämpfer zu homologieren, haben wir einen "Vorschalldämpfer" in der Mitte der Auspuffleitung hinzugefügt.
Right Side Exhaust Pipe BMW K models
The Right side exhaust pipe for BMW K-series is 100% Swiss road legal with DTC Swiss Certificate!

Hattech Oyk High silencer for BMW R NineT are made of stainless steel. This rear silencer with EG-ABE/ EU type approval with noise reduction insert in muffler outlet offer a muffled and rich sound. The silencer and suspensions hand-welded (TIG) are delivered with mouting material and available in 3 different surface variants: polished, brushed or brushed & tarnish on the welds.

EN.description: Hattech Oyk silencer for BMW R NineT are made of stainless steel. This silencer with EG-ABE/ EU type approval is light with excellent performance and is available in 3 different surface variants: polished, brushed or brushed & tarnish on the welds.

blocks.text: With EG-ABE/ EU & CH type approval
Weight saving to the series: 1700 grams
Visually and technically at the highest level. Only model in the test to be supplied pre-assembled.

Shock absorber and connecting tube welded. Suspension welded. 100% fit and tightness. Enormous surprise on the test bench: pushes 114 Nm already at 4800 rpm, significantly earlier than the series (original silencer 110 Nm at 6200 rpm, Akrapovic 105 Nm at 6400 rpm), without losses in the wider rev band. Also brings extra power in the peak 108 hp at 7600 rpm. (Original silencer 105 hp at 7800 rpm, Akrapovic 107 hp at 7600 rpm). An insider tip for the BMW. Swabian workmanship with a throaty sound! - dB-killer in the muffler outlet.

Hattech Oyk silencer for BMW R NineT are made of stainless steel. This silencer with EG-ABE/ EU type approval is light with excellent performance and is available in 3 different surface variants: polished, brushed or brushed & tarnish on the welds.
